name: piletitasku
description: Ticket Discovery Portal - A simple ticket discovery portal built with Nuxt.js and Laravel

scripts.docker:clean: docker compose down --remove-orphans && docker ps -a | grep piletitasku | awk '{print $1}' | xargs -r docker rm -f
scripts.migrate: docker compose exec backend php artisan migrate
scripts.seed: docker compose exec backend php artisan migrate --force && docker compose exec backend php artisan db:seed --force
scripts.migrate:fresh: docker compose exec backend php artisan migrate:fresh --seed
